name: Enviro-suit

name: A/KT Shockrider Crash Suit
description: Please see page 45 of the Enter the Unknown Sourcebook, or page 42 of the Stay on Target Sourcebook, for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Reduces strain received from Critical Hits to the wearer's vehicle by 1 (min 1).
Reduce damage from fires and weapons with the Burn quality by 1.

name: A/KT Tracker Utility Vest
description: Please see page 45 of the Enter the Unknown Sourcebook for details.

name: A/KT Mountaineer Armor
description: Please see page 45 of the Enter the Unknown Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Grants [BOOST][BOOST] to all Athletics skill checks made to climb or rappel

name: Catch Vest
description: Please see page 99 of the Suns of Fortune Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Has soak value of 2 against all energy-based weapons

name: Nomad Greatcoat
description: Please see page 99 of the Suns of Fortune Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Reduces difficulty of Resilience checks made to resist the effects of extreme cold by 1
Removes [SETBACK] added to checks due to extreme cold

name: Type III "Berethron" Personal Modular Armor
description: Please see page 99 of the Suns of Fortune Sourcebook for details.

name: TX-3 Combat Flight Suit
description: Please see page 99 of the Suns of Fortune Sourcebook for details.

name: Beast-Hide Armor
description: Please see page 49 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook, or page 44 of the Savage Spirits Sourcebook, for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Add [ADVANTAGE] to Coercion checks and [THREAT] to Charm checks.

name: "Storm" Charge Suit
description: Please see page 50 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: If attack against armor generates [TH][TH], attacker is disoriented for 1 round.
If attack against armor generates [DE], attacker is automatically hit for 8 damage.
Counts as being equipped with shock gloves

name: Mk. III Flak Vest
description: Please see page 49 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Add +1 Soak against damage from the Blast quality.

name: Protector 1 Combat Armor
description: Please see page 49 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

name: Mk.II "Steelskin" Anti-Concussive Armor
description: Please see page 49 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Add [SETBACK] to all Brawn- and Agility-based checks.
Reduce the duration of disoriented or staggered condition by 1 round.

name: PX-11 "Battlement" Powered Armor
description: Please see page 51 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Remove [SETBACK][SETBACK] from Perception, Vigilance, and combat checks imposed by darkness, smoke, or similar environmental factors that obscure vision.

name: Tailored Armored Jacket
description: Please see page 44 of the Far Horizons Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Add [ADVANTAGE] to any successful Charm, Deception, or Negotation checks.

name: Reinforced Environment Gear
description: Please see page 44 of the Far Horizons Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Removes [SETBACK] imposed by environmental conditions.
Add [BOOST] to Resilience checks to resist toxic atmospheres or airborne toxins.

name: Mk.IV Riot Armor
description: Please see page 44 of the Far Horizons Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Built-in breath mask
Reduce duration of disoriented or staggered results by one round (minimum of one round).

name: A/KT Wing Commander Armored Flight Suit
description: Please see page 42 of the Stay on Target Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Reduces strain received from Critical Hits to the wearer's vehicle by 1 (min 1).
Reduce damage from fires and weapons with the Burn quality by 1.

name: Caballerin-Series Riding Tack
description: Please see page 42 of the Stay on Target Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: May only be worn by a beast.
May ride a beast without suffering bareback penalty.

name: Capari-Series Padded Beast Armor
description: Please see page 43 of the Stay on Target Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: May only be worn by a beast.
May ride a beast without suffering bareback penalty.

name: Destri-Series Laminated Beast Armor
description: Please see page 43 of the Stay on Target Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: May only be worn by a beast.
May ride a beast without suffering bareback penalty.

name: H-Series Megafauna Carriage
description: Please see page 43 of the Stay on Target Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: May only be worn by a beast.
Requires silhouette 3+ and Brawn 5+.
May ride a beast without suffering bareback penalty.

name: Hutt Shell Armor
description: Please see page 104 of the Lords of Nal Hutta Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: May only be worn by a Hutt.
Allows wearer to hover up to five meters above the ground.
Allows wearer to ignore the affects of Awkward and Ponderous abilities.
Does not have to spend additional maneuvers when navigating difficult terrain.

name: Sakiyan Shadowsuit
description: Please see page 105 of the Lords of Nal Hutta Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Grants [BOOST][BOOST] to Stealth checks.

name: Blast Vest
description: Please see page 47 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Armor gains +2 soak when wearer suffers damage from a slugthrower or other physical projectile.

name: Mimetic Suit
description: Please see page 47 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Upgrade the ability of Stealth checks twice while suit is active.

name: Smuggler's Trenchcoat
description: Please see page 47 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Checks to find anything hidden within a smuggler's trenchcoat are opposed by the Skulduggery of the wearer.
The coat can conceal up to 2 encumbrance worth of items.

name: Banal Apparel
description: Please see page 47 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Opposing characters upgrade the difficulty of checks to identify wearer once.

name: Cargo Clothing
description: Please see page 47 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.[P][I]

name: Diplomat's Robes
description: Please see page 47 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Add [BOOST] to social checks claiming diplomatic authority, accessing classified data, and bypassing normal protocol.

name: Flare Jacket
description: Please see page 48 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Once per encounter, can trigger flare charge. Everyone in short range makes [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Vigilance check[b]. Fail means staggered for 1 round, plus 1 round per [TH][TH][TH].

name: Hauling Harness
description: Please see page 48 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Upgrade difficulty of combat checks twice.

name: Holographic Costume
description: Please see page 48 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: [B]Easy ([DI]) Computers check to record new garment, [B]Daunting ([DI][DI][DI][DI]) Computers check[b] to record facsimile of garment.

name: Lector's Outfit
description: Please see page 48 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Add [BO] to social checks involving large groups of listeners.
Can be heard clearly at considerable range.

name: Noble Regalia
description: Please see page 49 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Downgrade difficulty of social checks to interact with nobility or subordinates once.

name: Performer's Attire
description: Please see page 49 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Add [BO] to checks to perform or attract attention.

name: Powered Capacitive Armor
description: Please see page 49 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: As maneuver, power up and add +1 defense and +1 soak, but lose free maneuver.

name: Resplendent Robes
description: Please see page 49 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: If wearer draws attention to himself, allies in medium range add [BO] to Perception, Skulduggery, and Stealth checks.

name: Second Skin Armor
description: Please see page 49 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Add [SE][SE] to Perception checks to notice second skin armor on the wearer.

name: Polis Masson Bodysuit
description: Please see page 109 of the Strongholds of Resistance Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Includes a head-mounted multidirectional glow rod.

name: Leviathan Power Armor
description: Please see page 109 of the Strongholds of Resistance Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Includes a built-in respirator
Includes a built-in Mini-Torpedo Launcher
Includes a built-in DF-D1 Duo-Flechette Rifle
Reduces the difficulty of Resilience checks made to resist the effects extreme cold by one. Removes up to [SETBACK][SETBACK] added to checks due to extreme cold.
Removes up to [SETBACK][SETBACK] added to all Perception, Vigilance, and combat skill checks due to darkness, smoke, or other environmental effects that obscure vision.
All combat checks to operate outside of water have their difficulty upgraded twice.

name: Verpine Fiber Ultramesh Armor
description: Please see page 109 of the Strongholds of Resistance Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Armor may be powered up/down as a maneuver.  While powered up, gain +2 defenses. [AD][AD] or [TR] from hostile Combat check can cause armor to run out of power.  Cannot be powered up again until end of encounter.

name: Cresh "Luck" Armor
description: Please see page 47 of the Keeping the Peace Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Add automatic [AD] to Vigilance checks.

name: Jedi Battle Armor
description: Please see page 47 of the Keeping the Peace Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Wearing Jedi Battle Armor fitted for someone else adds [SE][SE] to all combat checks.
Fitting to new wearer requires a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Mechanics check[b] and an hour to complete.

name: Jedi Temple Guard Armor
description: Please see page 48 of the Keeping the Peace Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Contains helmet comlink.
Contains integrated scanner.

name: Jedi Training Suit (Weighted)
description: Please see page 48 of the Keeping the Peace Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Removing weights requires an [B]Easy ([DI]) Mechanics check[b].

name: Jedi Training Suit (Unweighted)
description: Please see page 48 of the Keeping the Peace Sourcebook for details.

name: Kav-Dann Power Armor
description: Please see page 48 of the Keeping the Peace Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Remove [SE] caused by darkness, smoke, or other environmental factors that might affect vision from Perception, Vigilance, and Combat checks.
Gain [BO] to resist the effects of radiation.

name: Koromondian Half-Vest
description: Please see page 49 of the Keeping the Peace Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: When wearer suffers Critical Injury, armor suffers minor damage, or increases current damage by one step.

name: Riot Armor
description: Please see page 49 of the Keeping the Peace Sourcebook for details.

name: Cloaking Coat
description: Please see page 47 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Upgrade difficulty of checks to detect an individual wearing a cloaking coat using sensors or electronics twice. Droids with Intellect less than wearer's ranks in Computers are similarly affected.

name: Mechanic's Utility Suit
description: Please see page 48 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Counts as having a tool kit.

name: N-57 Armor
description: Please see page 48 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: As a maneuver, may recharge energy weapon that has run out of ammo.

name: P-14 Hazardous Industry Suit
description: Please see page 48 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Counts as wearing a breath mask.
Add [BO][BO] to [B]Resilience checks[b] to resist heat, cold, radiation, or other hostile environmental conditions.
Wearer does not suffer effects of Burn or Disorient qualities.
When suffering strain to take an extra maneuver, suffer 1 additional strain.

name: AniPro Layered Beast Armor
description: Please see page 44 of the Savage Spirits Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: May only be worn by a beast.
May ride a beast without suffering bareback penalty.

name: Chitin Armor
description: Please see page 45 of the Savage Spirits Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Add [ADVANTAGE] to Coercion checks and [THREAT] to Charm checks.

name: Survivalist Armor
description: Please see page 45 of the Savage Spirits Sourcebook for details.

name: Alliance Light Stealth Armor
description: Please see page 49 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Adds [BO] to the wearer's Stealth checks.

name: Imperial Hazard Trooper Armor
description: Please see page 49 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Remove [SE][SE] due to darkness, smoke or similar environmental factors that obscure vision from the wearer's Perception, Vigilance, and combat checks.

name: Imperial Storm Commando Armor
description: Please see page 49 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Helmet is equipped with macrobinoculars, scanner goggles, and a comlink.
While wearing storm commando armor, a character removes [SE] due to darkness, smoke, or similar environmental factors that obscure vision from all Perception, Vigilance, and combat checks.
Adds [SE] to other characters' Perception checks to detect the wearer.

name: Rebel Heavy Battle Armor
description: Please see page 50 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Equipped with a helmet-fitted breath mask and respirator.

name: Karflo Thinsuit
description: Please see page 50 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Remove [SE][SE] from checks imposed by environment in which the user is currently operating.

name: Crash Gear
description: Please see page 43 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Wearer ignores the effects of ongoing Critical Injuries on any Intellect- or Cunning-related checks, but still suffers from the injuries.

name: G-Suit
description: Please see page 44 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Wearer reduces strain cost to perfrom a second Pilot Only maneuver by 1.

name: Pit Crew Coveralls
description: Please see page 44 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Reduce damage from fires and weapons with the Burn quality by 1.

name: Zephyr Stealth Suit
description: Please see page 44 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Wearer upgrades the ability of any Stealth check once.

name: Hunter's Trophy Armor
description: Please see page 49 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details. [P][I]Note:  If making your own suit from owned hides, price/rarity drops to 1000/6.[i]

base_mods.misc_desc: Wearer suffers [SE] to Charm checks.
Wearer gains [BO][BO] to Coercion checks due to armor's intimidating appearance.

name: Armored Drop Suit
description: Please see page 49 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details. [P][I]Note:  A vehicle version of this armor exists with the same name.[i]

base_mods.misc_desc: While conscious and flight systems are engaged, wearer cannot suffer falling damage.

name: Mandalorian Armor
description: Please see page 50 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.
